rooms.description: Spacious entrance hall with floor-to-ceiling windows for natural lighting, incorporating Vastu alignment for auspicious entry. Designed with Mediterranean aesthetics.
Open-plan living area featuring Mediterranean decor, large floor-to-ceiling windows to maximize sunlight and scenic views; includes built-in storage and seating.
Dining space integrated with the living room, characterized by Mediterranean style with natural stone accents and ample natural light from adjacent windows.
Efficient kitchen layout designed for small budgets; uses modern fixtures and Mediterranean-inspired cabinets; features a window or skylight to enhance ventilation and brightness.
Compact utility area for laundry and storage, ensuring functionality without compromising the aesthetic flow of the ground floor.

openings.description: Large entrance door with glass panels to allow natural light into the entry hall, designed in Mediterranean style and compliant with Vastu orientation.
Floor-to-ceiling windows strategically placed along living and dining areas for optimal sunlight penetration and ventilation, adhering to budget constraints while ensuring aesthetics.

vastu_adherence: The design integrates key Vastu principles such as the placement of the entrance and primary rooms in the north-eastern sector, with sufficient natural light and ventilation in all spaces.
budget_consideration: Materials and finishes are selected to ensure affordability while maintaining a Mediterranean aesthetic. Cost-effective solutions include prefabricated elements where possible.
